answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!In all probability this is due to moisture. But since they turn red or brown, possibility of fungal infection and peripheral neuropathy due to diabetes or hypothyroidism should be ruled out. Please consult a neurologist regarding this. Take care!

question: I have got brown kinda wrinkly patches of skin at the top of each finger on my hand and now its spread and i have them on top of my hand everywhere. After each shower they turn red then brown again????????............. I dont have a good diet nor do i get much sunlight, am i just real unhealthy????????
title: Its Only On My Right Hand.... Very Odd......
